author: GameSpot
description:
From its new characters and mechanics to its ties to the franchise’s mobile spin-off, here’s everything to know about Octopath Traveler 0.

Octopath Traveler 0 is an adaptation of Octopath Traveler: Champions of the Continent, a mobile game that released in 2020 in Japan. While the original plan was to simply port the title over to console, the developers didn’t want the experience to feel redundant for those that had already played it, and therefore decided to largely overhaul the experience.

#gaming #gamespot #game #octopathtraveler
title: Octopath Traveler 0 Everything To Know
